text: An erotic thriller is a form of the thriller genre that involves sexuality. Many people liked this from around 1984-85 until the early 1990s. After that, not as many people liked it. It is, however, still popular. An erotic thriller can be a book, a movie, or a television program. Examples of erotic thriller movies are Basic Instinct, Color of Night, Single White Female (1992), Body of Evidence, Crash (1996) and Basic Instinct 2 (2006). ==References== Category:Works about sexuality Category:Thriller movies
title: Erotic thriller
